content.detailedDescription:
Again, my daughter has seen a very strange, bright green object about the size of a baseball (as seen from her bedroom window) zigzag across the sky above, basically over our street. she wasn't sure how high up it was but described it as the size of a baseball. the green orb-like light had "spikes" on it in random lengths. the event caused her to become very scared, since she's seen these things before and feels she has been abducted. she is 11. 

i went outside to look with her. there was minimal cloud cover over our house, with some wisps of clouds higher up. we could clearly see stars and planes and satellites flying overhead. she became fearful after a few minutes and went inside. i sat outside to watch if the light came back.

what i saw in about 20 minutes of sitting outside was a flash of light overhead that i wasn't sure was a shooting star. it seemed rather close. i didn't get a good look at it so i just decided it must have been a shooting star. i also saw what appeared to be dark orbs swooshing past, but i figured these were just my imagination as well.

then, sitting on my porch, in the streetlight, i saw something below treetop level move down the street, like a vapor trail. there was no light, other than the streetlight, and if i hadn't been watching it, i wouldn't have seen this dark vapor move from east to west. i wasn't scared, but i was on the phone with my mother and i said, "oh my gosh, i just saw something!" this vapor trail was seen in the streetlight. there were no fires nearby or woodstove heaters on being as the temperature outside is 82 degrees f which might explain a vapor trail, nor were there any cars driving past. this was a distinguishable swoosh of a vapor trail directly in front of my house. i would estimate it was about 4-5 feet long and dissipated almost immediately. this was not a shadow; i saw something really odd. as it was dark out, i know this was not a bird and i saw no bats this evening either. there was no sound other than crickets chirping.

this is the third time one or two of my children have seen these strange glowing orb-like things with spikes on them. i don't know what they are and i have not seen them, but my kids are freaked out by them! i honestly believe they are seeing something strange because their reactions are always fearful and upset. i might even have chalked it up to imagination tonight had i not seen that weird vapor trail in the streetlight, about 20 feet up.
content.summary: Large baseball-sized vibrant green object with "spikes" zigzagged through the sky

content.detailedDescription: While driving down interstate 84, ufo appeared momentarily like a star then shoot forward leaving a trail before disappearing.  thought it was a shooting star or plane but was below cloud cover and way too fast to be a plane (plus no tail lights or shape).   ufo traveled in line with highway, we lost sight of it when it simply disapeared.  again, the best way i can describe it was a very low shooting star...But much faster and brighter.
content.summary: Ufo appeared like low flying shooting star

content.detailedDescription:
i was at the park with my friends just talking. it was around twilight 7:15-30 pm. i noticed the pink sunset color in the sky that evening. 
i happened to looked up towards the ne and my eye caught a dark fuzzy boomerang(but fatter)object shooting across slightly above tree top level going in a straight line in a se direction until it was out of sight. the color was black and it seem not quite solid. noise or sound was not noticed. it did not look at all like a common aircraft or animal.
  the observation was about 1 second. the person next to me also caught a brief glimpse of something dark moving across the sky fast. she thought that it resembled a spotlight except it was black. both of us said "what??" and thought it was strange. we did mention this to a third person who was looking down at that time. it was a strange footnote but we didn't dwell on it too long.
content.summary: Around dusk i saw a dark fuzzy boomerang object shooting across tree top level going from ne to se.

content.detailedDescription: Sitting on my front porch with my daughter in gerton nc which faces east looking over black mountain  and i spotted a ridiculously huge orange glowing cross hovering in the se.  i made my daughter turn around so she could see it.  we both watched as it hovered, pulsed, dropped down a bit, rise up a bit, morph into diamond, then star like then triangle like and slowly traveled towards the sw.  it was still in the gerton area or maybe bat cave but it just disappeared.  we could still see the sky where it should have been but it was gone and at that point we witnessed a plane traveling fast from the se as if it were trying to catch it.  at one point we had both visible and it was very obvious that the plane was dwarfed by the ufo.  it was huge.
content.summary: huge orange glowing cross hovering in se of gerton, nc and disappeared in sw, plane went after it

content.detailedDescription: Me and my girlfriend were going to the store and saw a object floating in the sky. i told my girlfriend to look at that floating. she looked and said it was a satellite. i said no its not look at the light and the movement. this thing was moving fast. after getting to the store and heading back home. we saw it again in a totally different area of the sky. the lights were 1 constant rapidly blinking white light. the last lights were blinking sequential to each other. the maine light constantly blinking. as we got out on the back road to my house we saw it again so we stopped and watched. the object looked as if it were moving away. then all of a sudden it went from far away to getting bigger and bigger very rapidly. so i told my girlfriend lets go we sped off toward. after we started heading to the house i watched it it followed us the whole way flying at lightning speed to a different portion of the sky. when we got to my house we got out of the car and it was just hovering in the sky. i watched it the whole way to the house. as i went to take the last step to the house the object dissapeared. i was kind of starled and scared by what happened same as my girlfriend.
content.summary: Object hovering in sky started to follow me

content.detailedDescription: I am unsure if this qualifies as an unidentified "object", however i did see a strange phenomena in the sky. at approximately 8:15pm on 09-09-13 i saw what i can best describe as a luminous line in the night sky. it was as far as i can tell a perfectly straight line, which from my distance must have been extremely long (mile?). it appeared to be virtually motionless despite changing cloud currents near it. around 8:45pm it began to fade and slowly became obscured by cloud cover. at the onset of the event i called my mom who also confirmed seeing it. i attempted to take a photo of it with my cellphone and digital camera.
content.summary: Lumunious line in new jersey sky

content.detailedDescription:
Saturday 9/7/2013 @ 9:10 pm
kankakee, illinois u.S.
home walking our dog outside.

spotted orange/red glowing balls (out of the corner of my left eye) moving from tree line by aroma park's two rivers festival to the west of our house.  they were moving in a straight line from north to south, then changed to north west.  there was a single unit in front, then multiples followed in groups of (3).  lost sight of all of them as they moved into clouds.  lasted for 10 minutes.  no sound or trails seem from objects.  called wife out to see and she had no clue what it could be.  i enjoy looking at the stars and have seen satellites, space shuttle, space station, and shooting stars.  this was different!!!  i have no clue what this was...

i tried to get a picture, but was too late.
content.summary: Orange/red orbs traveling from west to north west, 10-15 of the moved in groups of 3

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving north-bound on the 605 freeway. there is a flightpath followed by all incomming flights preparing to land at lax. as i was driving i noticed a bright silver object hovering near an incomming passenger jet flying towards lax, the object wasn't blocking that flight path, it was hovering a little higher than the incomming flights. then i took a second to put my eyes back on the road where i was driving, then when i looked back at where the object was,it was gone. so i don't know what to think about it. 

when i first noticed it, i was thinking that it might possibly be another airline comming in for a landing, but a couple things seemed odd to me.

1. the shapes of other planes comming in where easily distinguishable, but this object looked like just a very bright light in the sky. there was plenty of sun out as it was only approx 4:15pm. it seemed smaller than other airlines and circular.

2. it wasn't moving at all. it seemed to just be hovering or frozen in place. just beneath it was a large airline comming in towards lax.

3. i looked away for just a second because i was driving and didn't want to cause a crash, then when i looked at it again, it was gone, and all i could see was that airline.
content.summary: Hovering near airline headed towards lax

content.detailedDescription:
This is the most recent of sightings a friend and i have seen. the first time we seen the object it was just a hovering, star-like, multi-coloured light off my back deck. it moved slowly but stayed in the same area of the sky. the second time was a bit different, a plane flew by what looked like the same object. the plane kept moving and slowly got bigger and bigger till it passed overhead. however the glowing object (same as the prior night) stayed in the same area. after a few seconds the object started to drop rapidly then just stopped. the object was in the same location as the prior night, the object looked the exact same and did the exact same movements. the object was seen the second night for hours. i would continuously go outside and still see it, sometimes it would be in a slightly different location or have a different coloured glow but it would be in the same general area. 

the last time was the most unbelievable. yesterday the same friend of mine and myself were driving home around 12am. we spotted the object as we turned the corner by dairyqueen on king george road. we stopped, got out of the car, and the object looked like an oversized helicopter or something. it had 2 lights on the front and back, 2 on each side (or each wing?), and one in the center above all the other lights. the object flew in the same manner, erratic. we couldn't believe it. the object then flew right over king george road, we hopped in the car to chase it. chased it towards kensington where it flew low and started gaining speed. it then disappeared for about 5 minutes as we drove around and couldn't find it anywhere. as were driving towards memorial and powerline we see the same object hovering over the fields towards powerline and governors road. the object had turned off all flashing red,blue,pink lights and was staying almost perfectly still with only its white bright light one (which had a weird pulse to it). the object started to rise a bit and we realized there was no way we could catch it. we drove back to my house (where we seen the first 2 sightings) and seen the same object over in the same area as it was the first 2 times hovering by powerline and memorial. it started pulsing again like usual and moved to the left, to the right, and up and down. then just sat there like it had the other nights. we watched it for another hour or so then went inside. a few hours later i went outside and it was gone.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo witnessed near north-east end of brantford, 3 sightings of the same object

content.detailedDescription:
This is an account of the most recent of four or five sightings of similar phenomena.

on the evening of saturday the 6th of september, 2013 my wife and i walked out onto our open back porch to stargaze and have a smoke. our porch is covered like a pavilion but isn't screened or enclosed. i looked to the southeast & noticed a bright orange orb floating slowly in an easterly direction. i called for my wife and she and i watched the bright object as it moved below heavy cloud cover. the orange light moved slowly until it eventually disappeared into the clouds. this was our 4th or 5th sighting of this type of object. i see them as all being the exact same type of object however my wife feels that one of the objects was different. it sounds funny but she felt that one of the sightings we had was more spiritual in nature. that encounter was followed by the sighting of a white canine that we'd never seen before on our property. i am familiar with chinese lanterns however i have never seen one close up. i find it strange that we've seen these months apart at different times of the evening. sometimes they pulsate randomly. sometimes the brightness is consistent. there is never any type of trail but at times it has seemed to either ascend or descend. when we saw our first object i thought it was meteoric material that had most of it's mass burned away causing it to almost float. like volcanic rock?

during all of these events we were in awe of what we saw. speaking for myself, i was covered in gooseflesh. i felt like i needed a camera and i was frustrated that the sighting was so short. during our last sighting my wife ran to get her smart phone to try and photograph the bright object however it had moved too far by the time she returned with the phone.

each time we've seen this type of object we watched it until it either went into clouds or over some trees on our horizon. i feel we'll see it again in two or three weeks which seems to be the pattern.
content.summary: Another orange orb/fireball witnessed gliding over lake house

content.detailedDescription: I was just reporting to work when i looked over the mountains to see the sun rise. from the north i noticed a very long skinny object emitting a lot of heat moving very slowly to the south. i watched this object for about 5 minutes as it crossed the horizon. no trail was left by the object and i could not hear anything (it was a very quiet morning). i gathered a few of my coworkers as i felt that this was something that was needed to be seen to be believed. we all witnessed the object make a turn to the east and disappear after about 30 seconds. as soon as the object disappeared another object became visible from the north meeting almost the exact same description. it followed the same path and took about the same amount of time to finish the path and disappear. this occurred with a total of 5 objects. about 10 minutes after the 5th object disappeared a jet flew over the vicinity.
content.summary: 5 objects in total taking exactly the same path

content.detailedDescription:
I'm a musician now living in maine,my band just finished our set at the local coliseum. we were loaded up and getting ready to leave when our bass player noticed something in the sky. we all (5-6-people) looked up and saw several lights in the sky. it took a few moments to comprehend what we were seeing.It's kinda hard to explain,mostly because i have no normal frame of reference to give you a mental picture. the closest i can come is to say it looked like the lights were attached to an huge,invisible perpetual motion machine. the first thing i saw was 3 white lights in a triangular pattern, the 2 white lights at roughly the same level on top with a third light seeming to hang below. the lower light seemed to be slowly swinging left to right. as we watched, a fourth light(red) came on above the two upper lights,slightly to the left. next,two green lights appeared to the right and left of the red light. here's where it gets really weird, the two green lights rotated first left 180 degrees,then right 180 around the red light as all three swung slowly to the left and right. it almost appeared as if they were waving to us like they knew we had noticed them. then the colored lights went out but the white lights stayed on.Initially the whole formation seemed to be moving left to right,then stopped when the color sequence happened, them slowly moved directly away from us and faded into the distance. it was around the height where a helicopter would normally fly,made no noise whatsoever. i'm still trying to comprehend what i saw,but the motion of the lights was so bizzare that i can't...
 i have seen a lot of photo's and video of strange phenomina,and i can tell you this was absolutely unique.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Strange lights moving in a very unusual pattern.

content.detailedDescription: My partner and i had just left a restaurant in poipu and got in our car to drive home. we both suddenly decided to take a walk down a quiet street where there was a small beach to watch the stars. there were two men fishing in the darkness at the beach and they moved off down the beach when we sat down. we stayed for about 15 minutes and were about to leave when i looked straight up at the stars and slightly behind us overhead a 'fireball' was moving slowly towards the ocean from the direction of the hills. we were sitting in front of a high wall so could not see very far behind so do not know where it came from. only that it was big about the size of a 3/4 moon, and moving in a straight line right over the restaurant we had come from or so it seemed. we wondered what it was. i first thought it was a ufo but tried to reason that it could be a meteor but it had no tail, no sound and was too slow to be a meteor. as we were on the beach it went over quickly from when we first saw it and went straight out over the water and disappeared. it seemed to speed up significantly over the water as it was gone in a few seconds. we did not see it go into the water. and the direction was ssw. there is nothing out there such as another island for quite a ways. i think the entire event was less than a minute. maybe 30 seconds. i have looked for other observations that night but have not found any. but have seen others photos of the firey orange crafts very much like what we saw.
content.summary: Firey orange bright object appeared overhead moving slowly towards the ocean. noiseless.

content.detailedDescription:
At 20:35 est my girlfriend called me in a panic stating that while walking her dog she witnessed approximately 15 yellowish orange lights traveling from the northeastern sky very slowly without making a sound in a southwesterly direction. she also stated that the lights were emanating heat and she could see a haze in the sky surrounding them. there were cars that had stopped to witness the event as well. after speaking with me she called 911 and was informed by the operator that they were receiving calls related to the event from both saint lucie and martin county. 

i conducted a cursory search on the internet to see if cape canaveral had any disclosed launches and if any fires had been reported in the vicinity. i found no information on either. i did find that in august of this year another report was made pertaining to the exact same lights in the sky and in the same city. there has also been no reporting in the local media.

my only guess would be flares dispersed from a military aircraft though unlikely over a heavily populated area due to the threat of potential fires.
content.summary: Unexplained lights in sky above port saint lucie, fl

content.detailedDescription:
1) i was in my bed when i noticed a bright whitish blue light drop out of the sky, stop, change shape into a cross like object and then shoot off getting smaller and smaller until it disappeared.

2) i first noticed it because it was so bright, it lit up my back yard.

3) i thought it was first a shooting star, but then it stopped abruptly, shifted its shape and then took off in a light speed manner.

4) round and a brilliant whitish bluish light that had awesome control over its speed and capable of other dimensional travel or extreme speed

5) every hair on my body stood straight up, i could not believe my eyes, i was excited yet scared, it was like nothing i have ever seen before

6) it flew away at extreme speed and vanished
content.summary: Huge white/bluish orb dropped out of sky changed shape and dissapeared

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside looking out at the sky,  really nice evening.  i noticed right away that there were more stars out than usual and brighter!  i saw what i thought was 2 shooting stars,  red flashing like.  but the stars didn't fall.  so i kept watching!  first there was like 8, then about 12-14 of these "stars".

they formed 2 triangles - again the white sparkle lights,  there was one large one and one big one.  they were just stationary most of the time,  but once they did form a circle.  a while later i noted them go into the triangle.  but there were a few that were just to the side.  not in triangle.  flashing stars/flairs,  red! 

i have seen this three nights in a row!  they were still out there 20 minutes ago!  they see to come about 9 pm and hoover till midnight,  tonight it's 1 am!  it looks like a fleet.

you can see them flash,  sometimes fall a straight line,  like a shooting start - red flare.  they flash in and out - then come back.  so i guess i had a couple things going on!

i just went outside because it was nice out - i've never seen anything like this!  honestly it gave me a panic attack tonight! they are intamidating looking!!!!! 

how can i see the clouds behind them when there is no moon out and it's dark.  the stars are in one area only - same spot the last 3 nights.  no other "stars" around!  clear,  and we don't get that many stars at my area of the city.  plus i looked later on and they are all gone!

right now they are still here.  i have seen them form a circle.  then triangle.  some just kind of flash or act like shooting stars.

i'm not sure what is going on but 3 nights in a row and they do not act like stars.  i a m kind of freaked out!!!  i've not seen this before.  
but everyone else sees them less time - i have seen them one hour last night,  going on 3 tonight and about 2 1/2 the night before! why are they staying here so long?????

advice? i'm scared!
content.summary: This is 3rd night in row.  was outside looking at sky,  thought saw shooting start.  then again - only they didn't fall.  i noted 2 triangles form after they wre in circle.  they move like shooting star and don't fall.   see clouds behind them & no moon

content.detailedDescription: I was at home watching t.V and it was my night off of work. i worked third shift at the time and was wide awake. as i was flipping through the channels i saw a live news broadcast of lights in the sky. as i watched, the few that were hovering were being joined with more. they formed shapes like triangles. some then left ascending up into the direction of space with lightning speed. they were red/orange orbs as i recall and it was a whole fleet, more than 10 for sure. after about 15 minutes if my memory is correct, the broadcast completely disappeared. i waited a minute and then flipped through the channels looking for more on this. nothing. it was as if it had never happened. days, weeks, months went by and never any mention of this. i did not even own a camera back then and i wish i had. all i have is my word.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Live news broadcast in san rafael, ca area

content.detailedDescription: We recently moved to a house with a nice porch so we've been spending more time outside at night sky watching more then we used to before we had a nice covered porch to sit on and sky watch, it was late and there were dogs behind our house and i got out a night vision scope to see into the dark to see what the dogs were barking at and saw nothing until i looked at the tree tops and saw a long white light through the night vision scope i didn't see anything so i looked through the night vision scope again and saw a long white light again so i stoop up and so did my wife and then we could see a dim red glowing craft, it rose slightly and slowly higher and then proceeded to move towards the east, so we tracked it for a few minutes and it went behind bigger thicker trees so my wife went off the porch to see if she could see it more when it came from behind the trees and she did for a few moments and then it just disappeared from sight and we no longer saw the craft after that
content.summary: Saw bright cylindrical light through night vision scope and then saw naked eye dim red light with naked eye

content.detailedDescription:
Went outside to lock up sheds and looked up at stars because it is clear. saw object moving directly above me moving steadily north. straight line, consistent speed, no sound, had a star like appearance, steady white light in color, about 20,0000 feet up, was flying due north. have seen objects like this many times and they are always not in the flight paths and always between 9 and 11 pm. i don't stay up late up at 5:30 am every day.
the date is 09/09/13
content.summary: Star like white object.

content.detailedDescription:
I saw a ufo in the same spot a few days ago also. 

i was on my porch smoking a cigarette, like i normally do, and i noticed this bright star that i saw the other day and then it disappeared the other day too. so because i knew that it wasn't a star because i noticed it the other day and then it was gone, i looked at it very carefully. it just looked like the brightest star in the sky but i noticed that it was bouncing around, so to speak. it was moving up and down and left and right and maybe forwards and backwards but i couldn't tell. it was mostly a white light but i noticed a little bit of color in there too. 

i actually went inside of my house and got my mother to show the ufo to her. she came out on to the porch and noticed it was moving around in place too. she didn't watch it as long as i did but at first she said "i see it moving up, it must be an airplane". then i called her out maybe 20 minutes later to show her that it was still in the same spot, but not exactly. airplanes don't hover and bounce around in place like this ufo did. and then later i called her out on the front porch to look at it one last time because the ufo was moving behind a big tree in the neighbors yard. (the ufo was pretty far away and pretty high up but not that far away because i saw it.) so the last time she went on the porch she had to go way to the left side of the porch to see the ufo that was slowly moving behind the tree. 

i watched the ufo for maybe 1 hour or so, give or take. the coolest thing about it was that it was basically hovering in place but it was bouncing around from left to right and up and down. i definitely noticed that it was moving because i sat on a seat on my porch and put a power line in between me and the ufo. i then kept my head very still and i noticed that the ufo was going up and down relative to that power line wire that was blocking the ufo. at first the ufo was above that same power line wire and by the time it moved behind the tree it was below that power line wire, and by quite a bit too. so from my perspective it descended. 

so at first i thought it was a star but i knew the other day that there was a "star" that just disappeared from the sky so i thought it might be a similar ufo and that's why i watched for so long or otherwise i would have passed it off for a bright star. 

my feelings were that i think the aliens are coming to visit. i was a little amazed that i noticed the ufo bouncing in place and then move so much, but very, very slowly. 

i lost sight of the ufo because it went behind a big tree in my neighbors yard. 

thanks!
content.summary: It looked like a bright star was bouncing around and moving until i couldnt see it any more.

content.detailedDescription: Started watching tv outside when i noticed a large light in the distance.  it was too large to be a planet or star.  i watched it for 5 minutes and noticed it wasn't moving.   my son and i studied it closely with binoculars and telescope.  it was hovering and throwing off red, orange, and blue lights.  it quickly moved west ward and stopped to hover about 5 minutes.  then it moved from downtown houston out towards katy in about 2 seconds.  it stayed hovering for 30 minutes .  it disappeared several times then reappeared  about 5 or 6 times.  then it quickly took off going west.
content.summary: Bright red and orange oblong object hovering over houston for 20 minutes.  darted quickly towards katy  and hovered for 30 minutes.

content.detailedDescription:
At 5:30 pm i was heading home from work in new jersey to my home in pennsylvania.  i was going south on i95, and traffic was very heavy that day.  it started backing up about 2 miles from the scudders falls bridge, which spans the delaware river that separates nj and pa.  about a half mile from the bridge there is a nice view of the western sky and treeline in pennsylvania before going down the hill to the bridge.  since mercer county airport is nearby, it is common to see planes approaching the airport from that direction.  i was sitting in bumper to bumper traffic at this spot and i noticed a large, glowing object that looked much bigger than a plane, appeared to be stationary, and was over the treeline in pa.  not too far and to the left of the object was a dark, rectangular object that was slowly moving with a "speck" in front of it. even from that distance i could tell that the "speck" was a small plane towing a rectangular sign, like you see at the jersey shore.  i watched the 3 objects for for a few seconds, but glanced away to make sure the traffic wasn't moving.  i looked back, and the large, strange object was gone!  the plane and sign were still there. i did notice that the plane and sign were moving away from where the strange object was.  i looked and looked, but could not find the odd looking aircraft.  traffic had began to move, and i crossed the bridge into pennsylvania.  

as i passed the exit for yardley/newtown, (the second exit in pa from the bridge) i caught a glimpse of a huge object in the air to the right of the exit!  i wanted to get off the exit to get a better look, but there was a very long line of cars in the exit lane.  after i passed under the underpass and then passed the cars entering 95 south from that exit, i saw the object again for a couple of seconds.  it had jagged, protruding sides, was white, looked big and not very high up.  since i was passing by in my car, i could not tell if it was moving or making any noise.  it definitely was not a regular plane or helicopter.  unfortunately i could only view this thing for a couple of seconds because the trees on the side of the road obscured it.  i did see the biplane towing the sign, which was advertising univest right after seeing the unknown object. it was on the opposite side of i95, and i saw it again when i got off at the 413 penndel exit.  i did not see the unknown object again, though. my only regret is not pulling off the highway so that i could view the unidentified aircraft better.  because of the heavy traffic conditions, i knew i would have a hard time getting back onto i95. there must be other people who saw this strange object.  it was rush hour, and the traffic was horrendous that day!  the object had to be visible from route 332 and township line road (shadybrook farm area).
content.summary: Large white object with protruding, jagged sides.  it was either hovering or moving very slowly.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at a car show at the brooklyn, ct fairgrounds.  sitting in a chair next to my hot rod, i was looking up at the sky as it was a beautiful day, sunny, clear and breezy.

i saw sunlight bounce off the object which originally attracted my attention.

i knew it was a ufo when i first saw it.  it had three circles, all connected, silve/gray in color.  there was a main circle, then one at five o'clock and one at eleven o'clock.

it moved slowly, front right to left.  there were two clouds, separated but apparent.  the object went into the cloud and never came back out.  that is how i lost site of the object.
content.summary: I saw the object move from the right, went behind a cloud and never came out.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down marlton pike and saw several objects in the sky that were just hovering. they caught my attention because the empty dark sky is prominent on that part of route 70. at first i thought it was lanterns or flares, because there was no immediate movement. then they started to move, one more than the others. at the same time three of them vanished and one remaining one changed direction and began to head ne. they had what looked like intentional directional movement, and were not flares or lanterns. all i know is that they were moving fast in the sky. philadelphia international airport has flight paths that cross over here, i have seen hundreds if not thousands of planes over my time living here; these objects were unlike anything i have seen in the sky. i was able to take photos and video, but now i understand why all ufo photos are terrible, i used my iphone and to me they were shoddy. take a look for yourselves. thanks.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 4-5 lights in the sky, appeared suddenly, majority took off nw one remained heading ne.

content.detailedDescription: Was driving home from work pulled over to look at skies on bypass..Saw very faint dimly light lights in north west skies..They were slowly moving further north west ..They covered a large portion of the sky..But could not see anything else it was very dark and black skies that night..So i took pictures and blew them up and it looks like an oil rig in the sky..Maybe military im not sure
content.summary: Saw very faint light objects in sky very dim and small moving slowly across sky

content.detailedDescription:
Ok, so there was a veld fire burning that has been burning for a few days and i was worried about the smoke and my parrots in the outside aviaries. 
i went for a walk to check how far the flames were and how immanent a threat.

so i looked up the mountain on our property to see if i could see flames and not just smoke. so i noticed a 'plane' fly over. we get a lot of small planes around here, but then when i looked at it. it had no wings.

i looked at it again, like a butterfly without wings, how does it fly? that couldn't possibly work is what i thought. if i had to describe it, from my view point in 2d.

it was a long cream coloured rectangle with almost like a attachment on the back end. like the hilt of a sword. it was not going fast, same speed as a little plane would fly, but no wings.

not fast enough for a missle and there were no line behind it. it was just weird.

honestly it didn't have a lot of relevance at the moment the fire and the possibility of losing my home was a much bigger concern on my mind, i kept on my walk and checked on the flames and the wind speed.

also if anyone ever shows up here asking about ufos i'll send you packing.
content.summary: It was a warm dry sunday and the veld fire was getting close to my farm-home, i went for a walk to check on the progress of the fire and this 'plane' flew overhead and it had no wings and i thought to myself, what the hell, how does that work?

content.detailedDescription: I saw a bright glittery object in the sky so grabbed my camera and went outside to observe it. it hovered then started moving about and did this for about an hour. it was west over the pacific ocean, have seen it before but this time it was very bright goldish in color.
content.summary: Round orb shiny/glittery for about an hour

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were driving on our way home from her parents house just as it was nightfall. there was a good view of venus and saturn so i was keeping an eye out the window. about 500m from our driveway i took one last look at noticed 4 orange lights. i could figure out what they were. i first thought there were maybe fireworks, then maybe lights on an antenna tower. they were in a vertical line to our north west just above the horizon. the second light to the bottom looked to be more west than the other three. they disappeared behind a building and when we passed it they were now more in a square formation. i told my girlfriend to pull over so i could show her, we pulled into our driveway and got out. there were 3 now, i wasn't watching for maybe 10-15 seconds. the three now were in a triangle formation slowly heading east right over the hi way. my girlfriend went back to get her camera and as she grabbed it from the car they disappeared behind a cloud. we have both worked at the airport for 10 years and know what planes look like at night. it was not a plane. it was too low and too slow to be a satellite. i have no idea what it was.
content.summary: 3 orange lights in a triangle formation crossed us then disappeared behind a cloud

content.detailedDescription: While laying down on a trampoline looking directly to the sky my son and i noticed the formation of the ufos.  while observing they moved in a direction several times opposite the wind direction in a clear blue sky.  at the point they left during the 20 minutes of hovering and movement they took off faster than we have ever seen any jet plane and in multiple directions.
content.shape: Cigar,   Circle,   Cylinder,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Triangle
content.summary: Multiple craft / in triangle formation / extreme speed movements at point of leaving the area

content.detailedDescription: need some help here. last night my wife and i watched/observed an object fly over a far northern california small city/town for more than an hour starting at 9 p.M. it possessed a red light and a white light (side by side) and no flashing navigation lights that are required on all aircraft. the strange part is that this object flew in a grid pattern; more like a box pattern  what seemed to cover many many miles per side with each turn being quite abrupt. each cycle took 3 minutes and a few seconds and each time the pattern was more offset from the original. it was high altitude and continued more than the hour as we sat and watched. she got up at 2 a.M. and it was no longer flying. drone? ufo? i managed to zoom in and take a shot. it's just a small red dot in the sky.
content.summary: Red and white light flying a continuos, repeated, square grid pattern at 3 minute intervals for over an  1.25 hours. no navigation lights blinking.
